§ 5126. Mandatory application of sections 5102 and 5124 Notwithstanding section 5125 of this title, sections 5102 and 5124 of this title shall apply to—(1) all Indian tribes,
(2) all lands held in trust by the United States for Indians, and
(3) all lands owned by Indians that are subject to a restriction imposed by the United States on alienation of the rights of the Indians in the lands.
(Pub. L. 101–301, § 3(a), May 24, 1990, 104 Stat. 207.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 478–1 of this title prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
